commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Handles a query request, this method must be thread safe. *

* Information about the request may be obtained from req and * response information may be set using rsp. *

* There are no mandatory actions that handleRequest must perform. * An empty handleRequest implementation would fulfill * all interface obligations. */ public void handleRequest(SolrQueryRequest req, SolrQueryResponse rsp);
